app.title: AI Photo Enhancer & AI Studio
app.description:
🌟Why do people use photo quality enhancer?
Get gorgeous, clear HD portraits with best AI face enhancement technique. Fix old, pixelated, blurry, noisy, grainy, pixelated, damaged, low-resolution and low-quality photos instantly.

🌟FEATURE HIGHLIGHTS
✅AI Enhancer
Instantly improve image clarity, sharpen details, and bring your photos to life.
✅ AI Studio 
Generate high-quality AI-crafted portraits with different creative styles.
✅ AI Headshot  
Create professional AI-generated headshots for work or social media.
✅ AI Filter 
Apply unique AI-powered filters to elevate your images.
✅ Restore Old Photos 
Repair scratches, damage, and fading to revive old memories.
✅ Remove Objects  
Effortlessly erase unwanted objects or distractions from your pictures.
✅ Cartoonize Your Photos  
Turn pictures into fun AI-generated cartoons and avatars.
✅ Colorize Black & White Photos 
Restore vibrant colors to old black-and-white pictures.
✨ More exciting features are on the way—stay tuned!

📌 AI Enhancer makes your memories crystal clear! Download now to transform your photos and remini your precious moments!

- We welcome any feedback and comments. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us via zeezoo.mobi@gmail.com. We will work hard to bring you a better experience.
- Try Aiphoto - AI Photo Enhancer with a free trial - limited to one per Google Play account. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged a subscription fee. Your Pro subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Go to your Google Play account to manage your membership & to turn auto-renew off.
Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/photoenhancerzeezoo/
Terms of Service: https://sites.google.com/view/zeezooterms

app.summary: Unleash the Power of AI to Perfect Your Photos!

reviews.text: Doesn't work. It only works if you are trying to enhance a photo that is bad quality, that was downloaded from the internet. Makes your own photos look worse then before. If you take a photo an go to the app it can't find the latest photo until you fully close out an re launch the app. Has a lot of ads too.. it is not worth paying for it. the demo version doesn't even function properly. if i could show you with some screen shots and screen records, then that would be an easier way to explain
reviews.replyText: Hello, thank you for leaving a review. We're sorry we couldn't make you happier or more satisfied with the application. If you have any feedback or suggestions to help us enhance the app, please don't hesitate to share them through our support channels or the in-app feedback option.

reviews.text: Many times the app crashes while enhancing a photo. If it actually completes an enhancement, the enhancements look completely unnatural and unrealistic. It makes the photos look so fake that no-one will believe it's real. There are not any other options for enhancing photos. I made the mistake of choosing the yearly subscription that you pay off monthly. Now I have to continue paying for a completely useless app.
reviews.replyText: Hello, thank you for leaving a review. We're sorry we couldn't make you happier or more satisfied with the application. If you have any feedback or suggestions to help us enhance the app, please don't hesitate to share them through our support channels or the in-app feedback option.

reviews.text: Ran enhancing on 3 pixelated images. Pleased with the results for most part. Sometimes the AI turns eye lids into eyebrows/hair lines. Fortunately, didn't have any of the freezing issues others reported. Would be nice if the algorithm could enhance everything in a photo, not just the faces. (Or at the very least, the clothes of people). So at least the entirety of a subject is enhanced, not just part of it). With an expensive premium, having a demo/trial would be good for users to compare.
reviews.replyText: Hello, thank you for leaving a review. We're sorry we couldn't make you happier or more satisfied with the application. If you have any feedback or suggestions to help us enhance the app, please don't hesitate to share them through our support channels or the in-app feedback option.

reviews.text: You guys are not in love with the work. You are in love with money! This app is designed to grab money! The app itself is not like the ads! It just sharpens the faces a little, which is possible with other totally free photo editing apps!
reviews.replyText: Hello, thank you for leaving a review. We're sorry we couldn't make you happier or more satisfied with the application. If you have any feedback or suggestions to help us enhance the app, please don't hesitate to share them through our support channels or the in-app feedback option.

reviews.text: Amazing! Really so. At the outset, I thought it was some kind of magic. Superbly crafted, no doubt about it. I would like the developer team to reduce the ad time limit to a maximum of 15 seconds. That would attract more people who would spend more time and more likely to go premium after getting used to this application, which I am sure is still second to none. Keep up the excellent job of adding colours to people's lives. Well done, Winfun Studio!
reviews.replyText: Hello, thank you for your affection. We will continuously strive to improve so that you can have a more enjoyable and happier experience. Please continue to accompany us on this journey.If you have any feedback or suggestions to help us enhance the app, please don't hesitate to share them through our support channels or the in-app feedback option.

reviews.text: It only worked for 5 pictures, then stopped at 98% on all the others and wouldn't complete the process! On the 5 pictures it did complete they were really beautiful. Would be great if the bug was fixed.
reviews.replyText: Hello, thank you for leaving a review. We're sorry we couldn't make you happier or more satisfied with the application. If you have any feedback or suggestions to help us enhance the app, please don't hesitate to share them through our support channels or the in-app feedback option.

reviews.text: I paid for the app, $3.99 weekly with all intentions of canceling after my one picture was finished. Couldn't even get the app to open the picture. Tried several other methods of clearing it up and it made the picture worse. Do not waste your money!!!
reviews.replyText: Hello, thank you for leaving a review. We're sorry that we couldn't make you happier or more satisfied with this app. If you have comments or suggestions to help us improve the app, please feel free to share them via our support channel or the feedback option in the app.

reviews.text: I downloaded the app and I tried using the free trial after I initiated my ATM Card and status shows it was declined. Immediately I started receiving alert and they deducted my account 3 consecutive times without if carrying out the free trial days. The unfortunate thing is that I can't even cancel subscription from my Google play as I couldn't find it there. This is fraud and please google remove this app immediately.
reviews.replyText: Hello, thank you for leaving a review. We're sorry we couldn't make you happier or more satisfied with the application. If you have any feedback or suggestions to help us enhance the app, please don't hesitate to share them through our support channels or the in-app feedback option.

reviews.text: Firstly, instead of forcing Users to buy premium plan without letting them try the App out first, Users must be given the option to try the App's basic features and then take a logical call. Secondly, premium plans should be structured to attract them and increase subscribers manifold. Till then, the App is unworthy of trying out at our cost.
reviews.replyText: Hello, thank you for leaving a review. We're sorry we couldn't make you happier or more satisfied with the application. If you have any feedback or suggestions to help us enhance the app, please don't hesitate to share them through our support channels or the in-app feedback option.

reviews.text: This app fell short for me. It didn't allow me to make extra changes. It automatically made the changes for me. But on older black & white photos which I was looking to enhance, the AI app only enhanced the face not any other part of the photo. Very disappointing.
reviews.replyText: Hello, thank you for leaving a review. We're sorry we couldn't make you happier or more satisfied with the application. If you have any feedback or suggestions to help us enhance the app, please don't hesitate to share them through our support channels or the in-app feedback option.

app.developerLegalAddress: TDP số 6, Phúc Diễn, Bắc Từ Liêm, Hà Nội 11906, Vietnam
app.AIReview:
AI Photo Enhancer & AI Studio Review – A Deep Dive

Overview

AI Photo Enhancer & AI Studio has swiftly become one of the most downloaded photography apps on mobile, boasting over 4.2 million installs and a solid 4.11-star rating from a substantial user base of nearly 16,000 reviewers. The app’s core premise is simple: leverage artificial intelligence to dramatically improve the quality of your existing photos – from blurry snapshots to low-resolution images. It offers two primary modes: an “AI Enhancer” for quick improvements and an "AI Studio" focused on generating entirely new portraits in various artistic styles. The app's free tier provides a surprisingly robust set of features, making it an attractive option for casual photographers or anyone looking to salvage old memories without paying a premium. However, like many freemium apps, the full potential is unlocked through a subscription model.

Key Features

This app’s functionality revolves around three main pillars:

  • AI Enhancer: This core feature utilizes AI algorithms to automatically adjust parameters like sharpness, contrast, brightness, and noise reduction. Users can select from pre-defined enhancement levels (Low, Medium, High) or manually fine-tune the settings for greater control. The app claims to “instantly improve image clarity,” which, while an overstatement in some cases, delivers noticeable improvements with minimal user input. It supports a wide range of image formats including JPG, PNG and others.
  • AI Studio: This is where the app truly differentiates itself. Users can upload a photo (or use one from their gallery) and select from a diverse library of artistic styles – Watercolor, Oil Painting, Sketch, Comic Book, Pixel Art, and more. The AI then generates a new image based on that selected style, effectively transforming your photograph into a piece of art. This feature incorporates an “AI Headshot” mode specifically designed for creating professional-looking headshots.
  • Batch Processing: A useful addition is the ability to apply the AI Enhancer to multiple images simultaneously, saving considerable time when dealing with large photo collections.

Strengths

Several factors contribute to the app's popularity:

  • Ease of Use: The interface is remarkably intuitive. Both the AI Enhancer and AI Studio are easily accessible through prominent buttons on the main screen. The controls for each feature are straightforward, even for users unfamiliar with photo editing software.
  • Effective Enhancement (AI Enhancer): The AI Enhancer does a commendable job of quickly improving the visual quality of many photos. It’s particularly effective at reducing noise and slightly sharpening details in images that are inherently low-quality. We tested it on several grainy smartphone photos, and the results were consistently positive – images appeared noticeably clearer and more vibrant.
  • Creative AI Studio: The AI Studio is a genuinely innovative feature. Generating art styles from existing photographs is surprisingly fun and produces visually interesting results. The variety of available styles caters to diverse tastes, and experimentation with different settings yields fascinating outcomes. The “AI Headshot” mode offers a convenient solution for creating professional-looking portraits without the need for expensive studio sessions or complex editing skills.
  • Free Tier Functionality: Despite being a freemium app, the free tier provides substantial functionality that many users will find valuable. The AI Enhancer and basic style options in AI Studio are fully accessible without any payment.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, the app isn’t without shortcomings:

  • AI Studio Limitations: While impressive, the AI Studio's output isn't always perfect. Complex images with intricate details can sometimes be distorted or lose their original composition during the style conversion process. The results often require some manual tweaking after generation to achieve a truly polished look.
  • Over-Processing Risk: The “High” setting in the AI Enhancer can occasionally lead to over-processed images, exhibiting unnatural colors or excessive sharpening, particularly on photographs with fine details like skin textures. Users need to exercise caution and adjust settings accordingly.
  • Limited Style Customization (AI Studio): The available artistic styles could benefit from increased customization options. Currently, there's no way to adjust the intensity of the style effect or fine-tune parameters within the AI Studio.
  • Watermark on Free Tier: All generated images within the AI Studio are watermarked in the free version. This can be a significant limitation for users who intend to share their creations online or use them for commercial purposes.

User Experience

The user experience is generally positive and streamlined. The app's navigation is intuitive, with clear icons and labels guiding users through its various features. The image processing speed is reasonably fast, although complex AI Studio transformations can take a few seconds to complete. The interface feels polished and responsive, contributing to a smooth and enjoyable user experience.

Value for Money

The free version offers significant value, providing access to the core AI Enhancer functionality and a selection of artistic styles within the AI Studio. However, to unlock the full potential – removing the watermark, accessing all available styles, and increasing output resolution – users need to subscribe to the premium plan. The pricing tiers are competitive with other photo editing apps, but the subscription cost might be perceived as high by some considering the app’s reliance on AI for its core functionality.

Conclusion

AI Photo Enhancer & AI Studio is a powerful and surprisingly effective mobile app that leverages AI to revolutionize how users enhance and transform their photos. The ease of use, combined with the impressive capabilities of both the AI Enhancer and AI Studio, makes it a compelling choice for photographers of all skill levels. While the AI Studio’s output isn't always flawless and the watermark in the free tier is restrictive, the app's strengths significantly outweigh its weaknesses. We believe that with continued development – particularly improvements to the AI Studio's style customization options and resolution capabilities – this app has the potential to become a leading player in the mobile photo editing market. We rate it 4/5 stars.
